title: ReplaceField Single Message Transform
description: Configuration schema for ReplaceField transformation. Renames or removes fields from records.

type.description: The transformation type. Use 'org.apache.kafka.connect.transforms.ReplaceField$Key' for key transformation or 'org.apache.kafka.connect.transforms.ReplaceField$Value' for value transformation.
type.title: type

renames.description: Comma-separated list of field rename mappings in the format 'old:new'. Example: 'oldField1:newField1,oldField2:newField2'
renames.title: renames

exclude.description: Comma-separated list of fields to exclude from the output.
exclude.title: exclude

include.description: Comma-separated list of fields to include in the output. If specified, only these fields will be included.
include.title: include

defaultSnippets.label: ReplaceField - Rename fields
defaultSnippets.description: Rename fields using the format 'oldName:newName'. Multiple renames are comma-separated. Replace field names with your actual field names.
defaultSnippets.markdownDescription:
**ReplaceField** - Rename fields using the format `oldName:newName`.

Multiple renames are comma-separated. Replace field names with your actual field names.

**Format:** `oldField1:newField1,oldField2:newField2`

defaultSnippets.label: ReplaceField - Exclude fields
defaultSnippets.description: Remove specified fields from the output. Replace field names with the fields you want to exclude.
defaultSnippets.markdownDescription:
**ReplaceField** - Remove specified fields from the output.

Replace field names with the fields you want to exclude.

**Use case:** Remove sensitive or unnecessary fields from records.

defaultSnippets.label: ReplaceField - Include only specific fields
defaultSnippets.description: Keep only the specified fields in the output. All other fields will be removed. Replace with your actual field names.
defaultSnippets.markdownDescription:
**ReplaceField** - Keep only the specified fields in the output.

All other fields will be removed. Replace with your actual field names.

**Use case:** Whitelist only necessary fields for downstream systems.
